name: Rolando rodriguez
coverLetter: I have been trimming for 5 years I am a OLCC  card holder with experience handling many different types of material wet dry loose tight etc. looking for Sunday-Friday work 12 hour days 7am to 7pm . I can cover 3.0lb to 3.5lb a day if I half to buck it down and deleaf it if it's clean I can do up to 5lbs a day I would like to stay on site if possible to bring my living costs down other than that I am ready to work with my own reliable transportation i can cover food and other necessitys very proffesinal, presentable,respectful profficient in English and Spanish as well as harvesting, hanging and many other aspects of working in the marajuana field I look forward to your call thank you and have a wounderful day
